component.name: Frets on Fire X
component.summary: A community-driven rhythm game inspired by Frets on Fire.

description.p: Frets on Fire X (FoFiX) is a rhythm game where you use your keyboard or guitar controller to simulate playing music. As a fork of the original Frets on Fire, it expands on the gameplay experience with numerous enhancements and features.

ul.li: Support for multiple game modes, including multiplayer
Customization with themes, songs, and scripts
Advanced charting tools for creating and editing songs
Compatibility with Guitar Hero™ and Rock Band™ songs
Cross-platform support: Windows™, Linux®, Mac OS X™, and more
Open source project driven by an active community
